attributes.additional_details:
On 23 February 2012 the British government is planning a conference to deepen its intervention in Somalia. More than 40 governments and organisations have been invited to the conference, which will discuss a number of strategies to deal with the 'problem' of Somalia, potentially including military intervention.

No "intervention"!

From Afghanistan to Iraq, Kosovo to Libya, we have seen what imperialist "intervention" really means – bombings, proxy wars and invasions for the sake of natural resources, strategic maneuvers and profit. We won't stand by while another "intervention" is planned right under our noses.

Sign this petition if you are against planned military "intervention" in Somalia. Show your support and #HandsOffSomalia
